articles.title: I'M ONLY MOTIVATED TO DO GREAT THINGS WHEN I HAVE TO CLEAR MY PROCRASTINATED LIST.
I am not an OVERTHINKER... I just have Trained my Mind to BRAINSTORM Silly Ideas.
If you dream to build your empire one day, remember this. Because if you are Loyal to your People most of them will remain loyal to you.
Let your Soul be like the FORT - TALL and STRONG
THE WORLD IS NOW A MASQUERADE. SUITS, BOOTS, GOWNS AND HEELS, BUT NO FACES SEEN.
My God id Graceful Darling, I am Grateful for all.
Dust it Out, it's your time to SHINE...
Differences don't matter when you are with the right People
Start it Small. Make it Your EMPIRE
